name: Route53HostedZoneVPCs
description: The HostedZoneVPCs property is part of the AWS::Route53::HostedZone resource that specifies the VPCs to associate with the hosted zone.

properties.name: VPCId
properties.desc: The ID of the Amazon VPC that you want to associate with the hosted zone.

properties.name: VPCRegion
properties.desc: The region in which the Amazon VPC was created as specified in the VPCId property.
